Anyone know whats wrong? there isn't a russian file in either of the folders, how is it getting russing info?

click start on windows desktop , type RUN in the search file then type regedit press enter , then look for HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/SOFTWARE/wow6432node/Ubisoft/Farcry3
Then
you will see language russian change it to English and you will see sku rus change it for EN
Remove the russian.bat and .fat files from the directories, and it will be in english.

I also can confirm this is working just fine. Instructions were taken from another website, I kept the russian files in the main sound folder, you don't hear any dialogue audio, but gun shots car audio sounds all work, so once you get the english.bat /fat files should be fine.
